channel.title: [PI]A few quick questions
channel.description:
mk so ive been looking around a while but i cant really find these things for project insanity base:
-how to change spawn? ive edited in the config.java file and nothing happens, although everything else changes if i switch it in the config file. such as respawn.
-how to change the prices.txt output multiplier. that thing where it multiplies any price of an equipable item by 1.149. i want a way that the input is the same as the output
-how to change the name of the client . ive done everything except for the blue bar on the top idk where that is... and ive checked everywhere in the client files tbh
thanks

item.title: [PI]A few quick questions
item.dc:creator: @rrooaarr rrooaarr
item.description:
@rrooaarr wrote:

ehh ive tried ill just make a statement that teles them to home when they spawn.

Read full topic

item.title: [PI]A few quick questions
item.dc:creator: @rrooaarr rrooaarr
item.description:
@rrooaarr wrote:

3lv3n snip3r:

Npc spawns - spawn-config.cfg

i was asking for spawn point. where u spawn when u start out. it wont change

3lv3n snip3r:

Item prices - items.cfg (First 2 numbers after item description are shop prices).

trust me ive tried that and it doesnt really change.

3lv3n snip3r:

Client name - gui.java/client.java/Jframe.java (check all 3).

checking atm thanks

Read full topic
